trans-unit.source: Overview of Azure Resource Manager templates
trans-unit.target: Overview of Azure Resource Manager templates

trans-unit.source: Azure Resource Manager templates allows you to declaratively specify the Azure IaaS infrastructure in Json language by defining the dependencies between resources.
trans-unit.target: Azure Resource Manager templates allows you to declaratively specify the Azure IaaS infrastructure in Json language by defining the dependencies between resources.

trans-unit.source: See [Authoring extension templates](../articles/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-extensions-authoring-templates.md) to learn more about authoring templates for using Extensions.
trans-unit.target: See [Authoring extension templates](../articles/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-extensions-authoring-templates.md) to learn more about authoring templates for using Extensions.

trans-unit.source: In this article we'll learn about troubleshooting some of the common VM extension failures.
trans-unit.target: In this article we'll learn about troubleshooting some of the common VM extension failures.
